Heliomalt says he will maintain this mod. Transcript:

Heliomalt (08/17/2020 7:26:08 PM) theoretically, I adjusted the script
dirty20067 (08/17/2020 8:30:06 p.m.) that means you will always adjust it [the script] in the future
Heliomalt (08/17/2020 8:30:36 pm) as far as possible
dirty20067 (08/17/2020 8:31:09 pm) it would be ok for you to make the script available to me, because I would like to continue to offer it with us
Heliomalt (08/17/2020 8:31:21 PM) the version in your folder on the Schafe TS is the most current
Heliomalt (08/17/2020 8:31:29 PM) including config with bonds, etc.

Package.Name: Statistics Panels
Package.Description: This option shows you panels for an overview of the current vehicle´s stats, your account stats, and session stats on the parameters panel (right side of screen in garage).

Package.Name: vehicle parameters
Package.Description: Will show the tank stats, account stats, and session stats on the Vehicles Panel.

Package.Name: "Research Watchdog"
Package.Description: Will show the tank stats, account stats, and session stats on the Vehicles Panel.
